casebody.data:
Julia L. WEBB and husband, Donald Webb
v.
ALAMANCE REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER, INC., Kernodle Clinic, Inc., Mark D. Doner, M.D., and Douglas W. Peed, M.D. No. 449P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. Grover McCain, Jr., Chapel Hill, for Webb. Joseph P. Booth, III, Greensboro, for Medical Center. Leigh A. Kite, John H. Beyer, Charlotte, for Kernodle Clinic, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th day of September 2007 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of October 2007."
